name: Light on your Feet
description:
Team 5's submission for the Fall VGDC game jam. controls are basic "a" to move left "d" to move right and "space" to jump. You are a vampire so you can't touch the light, but only the light shows the world as it really is.

Made by
Kent Pluntze

Yasin Zuhuruddin

Jeruel Engo

Cary Xiao
